name: com.lmirman.rewiredglyphs
description: An expansion for Guavaman's Rewired Unity Asset that provides a simple to use API for showing input icons to the player at runtime based on their input method and bindings.

samples.description:
Contains default glyph sprite sheets and mappings for the sprite sheets.

The icons used are public domain attributed to Kenney assets. For more information and licensing info refer to https://kenney.nl/assets/input-prompts-pixel-16
